name: Just Shoot (Jason)
description:
Two ships. Hordes of enemies. All armed. They are coming endlessly. Stronger, faster and more dangerous than previous. How long can you survive?

"Just Shoot" is a free play top down shooter intended for two players for shared fun. Destroy incoming hostiles and survive as long as you can.

No objectives. No rules. No restrictions.

Play alone or with a friend, choose mouse or keyboard steering, select one of three themes, unlock gameplay options for more flexible adjustment, reach higher levels, invest points in skills and...just shoot!

arrow keys / W, S, A, D keys - movement
left mouse button (press and hold) - fire
right mouse button - autofire mode
tab - statistics window
Esc / P - pause game

Available in two languages: Polish and English.
Also available on Kongregate and Newgrounds!

Powered by Unity.
Jason, 2016
